stations.name: Karaköy (Tünel)
stations.notes: Galata Bridge・Karaköy Pier・Tersane Istanbul・Kılıç Ali Pasha Complex・Galataport・Istanbul Modern

stations.name: Beyoğlu (Tünel)
stations.notes: İstiklal Avenue・Pera Museum・Salt Beyoğlu・Saint Anthony of Padua Church・Metrohan Building・Taksim access

stations.name: Taksim
stations.notes: Taksim Square・Republic Monument・Atatürk Cultural Center (AKM)・Gezi Park・Start ofİstiklal Avenue

stations.name: Kabataş
stations.notes: Kabataş Pier・Fındıklı Campus (Mimar Sinan University)・Dolmabahçe Palace・Clock Tower

stations.name: Rumeli Hisarüstü
stations.notes: Boğaziçi University・Rumeli Fortress・Access to the Bosphorus waterfront via Aşiyan Funicular (F4)

stations.name: Aşiyan
stations.notes: Aşiyan Cemetery・Graves of poets like Tevfik Fikret・Seaside promenade and green spaces

stations.name: Seyrantepe
stations.notes: Rams Park・Stadium for Galatasaray S.K. home matches

stations.name: Vadistanbul
stations.notes: Vadistanbul Mall・Upscale shopping, dining, and office complex
